pkgmetadata.longdescription: Delete-d Jackknife for Point and Interval Estimation // This function creates jackknife samples from the data by sequentially removing d observations from the data, performs estimation using the jackknife samples and calculates the jackknife coefficients, bias, standard error and confidence intervals based on the methodology discussed by Quenouille (1956) doi:10.2307/2332914, Tukey (1958) doi:10.1214/aoms/1177706647 and Shi (1988) doi:10.1016/0167-7152(88)90011-9.
